docs.snippet: President Jose Mujica says Uruguay's legal marijuana market will be much better than the system in Colorado, which doesn't track the drug after sale. And he says the medical marijuana laws many U.S. states have adopted are based on "hypocrisy"...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Jose Mujica says Uruguay's legal marijuana market will be much better than the system in Colorado, which doesn't track the drug after sale. And he says the medical marijuana laws many U.S. states have adopted are based on "hypocrisy" because they enable people to fake illnesses to get prescription weed.

headline.main: Uruguay Leader Calls Colorado Pot Law 'a Fiction'
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Leader Calls Colorado Pot Law 'a Fiction'

docs.snippet: Uruguay has finally released its rules for the legal marijuana market it is launching this year, detailing how the government plans to get very involved in every aspect of the business. But anyone hoping the South American nation will become a...
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay has finally released its rules for the legal marijuana market it is launching this year, detailing how the government plans to get very involved in every aspect of the business. But anyone hoping the South American nation will become a pot-smoker's paradise should probably head to Colorado instead, President Jose Mujica suggested on Friday.

headline.main: Uruguay Leader Calls Colorado Pot Law 'a Fiction'
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Leader Calls Colorado Pot Law 'a Fiction'

docs.snippet: The German midfielder Sami Khedira has been named to the Real Madrid squad for the first time since sustaining an injury last November.

headline.main: Countdown to the 2014 World Cup in Brazil: Day 40

docs.snippet: Wayne Rooney should be left out of the World Cup team because he has had a poor season with Manchester United and England cannot rely on him when the going gets tough, according to former Chelsea midfielder Alan Hudson.

docs.snippet: President Jose Mujica signed the long-awaited rules for Uruguay's legal pot marketplace Tuesday, launching a rollout that should stock pharmacies with government-approved marijuana cigarettes for sale by year's end.
docs.lead_paragraph: President Jose Mujica signed the long-awaited rules for Uruguay's legal pot marketplace Tuesday, launching a rollout that should stock pharmacies with government-approved marijuana cigarettes for sale by year's end.

docs.snippet: President José Mujica and his cabinet signed long-awaited rules for Uruguay’s legal marijuana marketplace on Tuesday.
docs.lead_paragraph: President José Mujica and his cabinet signed long-awaited rules for Uruguay’s legal marijuana marketplace on Tuesday.
docs.abstract: Pres Jose Mujica and his cabinet sign long-awaited rules for Uruguay's legal marijuana marketplace, in which citizens 18 or older may cultivate up to six plants per household, or join a small marijuana growing club.

headline.main: Uruguay: Government Sets Rules for Legal Sales of Marijuana
headline.print_headline: Uruguay: Government Sets Rules for Legal Sales of Marijuana

docs.snippet: Uruguayans will be allowed to buy enough marijuana to roll about 20 joints a week at a price well below the black market rate, the government said on Tuesday as it detailed a new law legalizing the cannabis trade.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguayans will be allowed to buy enough marijuana to roll about 20 joints a week at a price well below the black market rate, the government said on Tuesday as it detailed a new law legalizing the cannabis trade.

headline.main: Uruguay Says Legal Marijuana to Be Good and Cheap
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Says Legal Marijuana to Be Good and Cheap
